Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I have seen and downloaded Quest JS and Github and Phonegap to turn a quest game into an app. I was just wanting to know if their was a tutorial on how you actually add the files and compile them to turn the quest game into an app for android? I have been looking and it just takes me to the same sites and can't find a tutorial if someone could help with this I would much appreciate it.
Thank You

Mike
